QGIS algorithm v.surf.rst.cvdev

Source: R/grass7_v_surf_rst_cvdev.R
grass7_v_surf_rst_cvdev.Rd

QGIS Algorithm provided by GRASS v.surf.rst.cvdev (grass7:v.surf.rst.cvdev)

grass7_v_surf_rst_cvdev(
  input = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  zcolumn = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  where = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  mask = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  tension = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  smooth = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  smooth_column = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  segmax = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  npmin = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  dmin = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  dmax = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  zscale = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  theta = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  scalex = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  .t = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  .c = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  cvdev = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_REGION_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_REGION_CELLSIZE_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_SNAP_TOLERANCE_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_MIN_AREA_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_OUTPUT_TYPE_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_VECTOR_DSCO = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_VECTOR_LCO = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_VECTOR_EXPORT_NOCAT = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  ...,
  .complete_output = TRUE
)

Arguments

input

source - Input points layer. Path to a vector layer.
zcolumn

field - Name of the attribute column with values to be used for approximation. The name of an existing field. ; delimited list of existing field names.
where

string - WHERE conditions of SQL statement without 'where' keyword. String value.
mask

raster - Name of the raster map used as mask. Path to a raster layer.
tension

number - Tension parameter. A numeric value.
smooth

number - Smoothing parameter. A numeric value.
smooth_column

field - Name of the attribute column with smoothing parameters. The name of an existing field. ; delimited list of existing field names.
segmax

number - Maximum number of points in a segment. A numeric value.
npmin

number - Minimum number of points for approximation in a segment (segmax). A numeric value.
dmin

number - Minimum distance between points (to remove almost identical points). A numeric value.
dmax

number - Maximum distance between points on isoline (to insert additional points). A numeric value.
zscale

number - Conversion factor for values used for approximation. A numeric value.
theta

number - Anisotropy angle (in degrees counterclockwise from East). A numeric value.
scalex

number - Anisotropy scaling factor. A numeric value.
.t

boolean - Use scale dependent tension. 1 for true/yes. 0 for false/no. Original algorithm parameter name: -t.
.c

boolean - Perform cross-validation procedure without raster approximation (leave this option as True). 1 for true/yes. 0 for false/no. Original algorithm parameter name: -c.
cvdev

vectorDestination - Cross Validation Errors. Path for new vector layer.
GRASS_REGION_PARAMETER

extent - GRASS GIS 7 region extent. A comma delimited string of x min, x max, y min, y max. E.g. '4,10,101,105'. Path to a layer. The extent of the layer is used..
GRASS_REGION_CELLSIZE_PARAMETER

number - GRASS GIS 7 region cellsize (leave 0 for default). A numeric value.
GRASS_SNAP_TOLERANCE_PARAMETER

number - v.in.ogr snap tolerance (-1 = no snap). A numeric value.
GRASS_MIN_AREA_PARAMETER

number - v.in.ogr min area. A numeric value.
GRASS_OUTPUT_TYPE_PARAMETER

enum of ("auto", "point", "line", "area") - v.out.ogr output type. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
GRASS_VECTOR_DSCO

string - v.out.ogr output data source options (dsco). String value.
GRASS_VECTOR_LCO

string - v.out.ogr output layer options (lco). String value.
GRASS_VECTOR_EXPORT_NOCAT

boolean - Also export features without category (not labeled). Otherwise only features with category are exported. 1 for true/yes. 0 for false/no.
...

further parameters passed to qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm()
.complete_output

logical specifing if complete out of qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm() should be used (TRUE) or first output (most likely the main) should read (FALSE). Default value is TRUE.

Details

Outputs description

  • cvdev - outputVector - Cross Validation Errors
